verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <S%H7892><s%> Shir, A Song לַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <S%H4609><s%> lam-Ma-'a-Lot of degrees אֶשָּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> 'es-Sa I will lift up עֵ֭ינַי <S%H5869><s%> 'Ei-nai mine eyes אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הֶהָרִ֑ים <S%H2022><s%> he-ha-Rim; unto the hills מֵ֝אַ֗יִן <S%H370><s%> me-'A-yin, from whence יָבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo cometh עֶזְרִֽי׃ <S%H5828><s%> 'ez-Ri. my help

עֶ֭זְרִי <S%H5828><s%> 'Ez-ri My help מֵעִ֣ם <S%H5973><s%> me-'Im from יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; [cometh] from the LORD עֹ֝שֵׂ֗ה <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh, which made שָׁמַ֥יִם <S%H8064><s%> sha-Ma-yim heaven וָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> va-'A-retz. and earth

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not יִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten He will not suffer לַמּ֣וֹט <S%H4132><s%> lam-Mot to be moved רַגְלֶ֑ךָ <S%H7272><s%> rag-Le-cha; thy foot אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- shall not יָ֝נ֗וּם <S%H5123><s%> ya-Num, thee will not slumber שֹֽׁמְרֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8104><s%> Sho-me-Re-cha. he that keepeth

הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- will neither יָ֭נוּם <S%H5123><s%> Ya-num shall neither slumber וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor יִישָׁ֑ן <S%H3462><s%> yi-Shan; nor sleep שׁ֝וֹמֵ֗ר <S%H8104><s%> v-Mer, Behold he that keepeth יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. Israel

יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD שֹׁמְרֶ֑ךָ <S%H8104><s%> sho-me-Re-cha; [is] thy keeper יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD צִ֝לְּךָ֗ <S%H6738><s%> tzil-le-cha, [is] thy shade עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and יַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> yad hand יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3225><s%> ye-mi-Ne-cha. upon thy right

יוֹמָ֗ם <S%H3119><s%> yo-Mam, thee by day הַשֶּׁ֥מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> hash-She-mesh The sun לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- Nor יַכֶּ֗כָּה <S%H5221><s%> yak-Kek-kah, shall not smite וְיָרֵ֥חַ <S%H3394><s%> ve-ya-Re-ach nor the moon בַּלָּֽיְלָה׃ <S%H3915><s%> bal-La-ye-lah. by night

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD יִשְׁמָרְךָ֥ <S%H8104><s%> yish-ma-re-Cha shall preserve מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol all רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> Ra'; thee from all evil יִ֝שְׁמֹ֗ר <S%H8104><s%> yish-Mor, he shall preserve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H5315><s%> naf-She-cha. thy soul

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD יִשְׁמָר־ <S%H8104><s%> yish-mor- shall preserve צֵאתְךָ֥ <S%H3318><s%> tze-te-Cha thy going out וּבוֹאֶ֑ךָ <S%H935><s%> u-vo-'E-cha; and thy coming in מֵֽ֝עַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> me-'at-Tah, this וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- from this time forth and even for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam. evermore
